## SessionManager.isMuted() method

Mute state.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isMuted(session: Session): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  session | Session | Session to check. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

## Remarks

True if sender's media track is disabled.
